papers.title: Advances in Neonatal Care Protocols
papers.abstract: This paper presents the latest advances in neonatal care protocols with emphasis on premature infant management.

papers.title: Risk Factors for Neonatal Respiratory Distress Syndrome
papers.abstract: A comprehensive analysis of risk factors contributing to neonatal respiratory distress syndrome in term and preterm infants.

papers.title: Neonatal Jaundice Treatment Guidelines: Updated Review
papers.abstract: Updated guidelines for the diagnosis and management of neonatal jaundice, incorporating recent evidence and therapeutic approaches.
